channel.title: Code on Uncombed Whiskers
channel.description: Recent content in Code on Uncombed Whiskers

item.title: ORA-04091
item.description:
Sounds familiar? A friend encountered it recently.

Mutating table problem from within a row level trigger on running a SELECT on the same table.

item.title: Scratchin & Squeakin
item.description: A friend introduced me to scratch today. I wrote a trivial program with it - A plane falling down on an unassuming unaware kitty, with sound effects of course.

item.title: Picking a code editor
item.description: If you are a programmer, it would’nt be an exaggeration to say that at least half of your life is spent within an editor. You are in your element within the editor. It’s the programmer’s domain where he/she creates something out of nothing, in a manner of speaking. Given this, it is really really important for a programmer to be the master of the editor he/she works with on a daily basis.

item.title: JS1K Winner
item.description: The JS1K winner has been announced. The entry is described in detail in a post by the programmer.

item.title: BBC breaking news on logging-in to your favorite shell
item.description: Crude yet working one-liner; Add to your favorite .rc file and Enjoy!

item.title: Pearls from the deep end =~ s/[a,s]//g
item.description: Reprinted from a veritable Perl/Tcl vs Scheme flame war of yore; of course without permission
